      • sendRegisterForeignDeviceMessage

        public void sendRegisterForeignDeviceMessage(java.net.InetSocketAddress addr,
                                    int timeToLive)
                                      throws BACnetException
        Sends a foreign device registration request to addr. On successful registration (AKN), we are added in the foreign device table FDT.
        Parameters:
        addr - The address of the device where our device wants to be registered as foreign device
        timeToLive - The time until we are automatically removed out of the FDT.
        Throws:
        BACnetException
